room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Cabin in the Woods was a blast!  It was our first time doing an escape room and it made a great first impression on us.  The puzzles were all very creative and the dark, spooky ambiance set the mood perfectly when we did this right around Halloween last year.  Staff was great, setting was great, props were good, and difficulty was high (we were very close and got stuck on the same directional lock as reviewer Justin).  We all recommend this one very highly.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Cabin in the woods was super fun!! Our host was a delight and the puzzles were challenging and rewarding!

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Pretty amazing! Biggest in Michigan! Had a great time. We did the Cabin in the Woods and the ambiance was awesome. However, we didnâ€™t know how to reset one of the locks. We wished that someone had helped through the intercom as we had the right combination, but had just never used a directional lock before. So that really prevented us advancing through the room. Really a bummer. But it was fun anyhow.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Did the Cabin in the Woods. The game is played in the dark with a flashlight. I felt like the two they gave us were not enough for everyone to feel involved.The room itself was fun but really hard. Staff was super nice. We had a malfunction on one of the tasks but they helped us and then gave us extra time. So I enjoyed this even though we did not make it out.

room_title: Escape room "Cabin in the Woods" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Amazing! Definitely surpassed our expectations and was super challenging and fun!! Owen was awesome too with the hints :) We did the Cabin in the Woods which was the hardest one but made it out. So awesome!
